pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: Ucapan selamat tahun baru, kartu tahun baru

lessons.japanese: 一般的に言えば、女性は男性よりほぼ１０年長生きする。
lessons.indonesian: Generally speaking, women live longer than men by almost ten years.

lessons.japanese: 私は三人組の中で最年長だ。
lessons.indonesian: I am the oldest of the three.

lessons.japanese: 僕は去年長い旅をした。
lessons.indonesian: I made a long journey last year.

lessons.japanese: 僕は去年長い旅をした。
lessons.indonesian: I took a long trip last year.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は夫よりも１０年長生きした。
lessons.indonesian: She survived her husband by ten years.

lessons.japanese: 彼は去年長い髪をしていた。
lessons.indonesian: He had long hair last year.

lessons.japanese: 彼はクラスの中で最年長にあたる。
lessons.indonesian: He is older than any other student in his class.

lessons.japanese: 彼はクラスの最年長である。
lessons.indonesian: He is older than any other student in his class.

lessons.japanese: 彼はクラスで最年長です。
lessons.indonesian: He is the eldest in his class.

lessons.japanese: 年長の息子たちは今は父親からまったく独立している。
lessons.indonesian: The elder sons are now quite independent of their father.

lessons.japanese: 私はクラスの中で最年長である。
lessons.indonesian: I am older than any other student in my class is.

lessons.japanese: 私はクラスの中で最年長である。
lessons.indonesian: I'm older than any other student in my class.

lessons.japanese: 子供はよく年長者の真似をしようとする。
lessons.indonesian: Children often try to imitate their elders.

lessons.japanese: 一般的に言えば、女性は男性よりほぼ１０年長生きする。
lessons.indonesian: Generally speaking, women live longer than men by almost ten years.

lessons.japanese: 一般的に言えば、女性は男性よりほぼ１０年長生きする。
lessons.indonesian: Generally, women live 10 years longer than men.
